tha-ap18:12.2: vissakammena māpito → vissakammena nimmito (bj) | visukammena māpito (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap18:13.1: Dasasaddāvivittaṃ taṃ → dasa saddā avivittaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap18:17.1: Sacevaseyya agāraṃ → sace vaseyyāgāraṃ (bj) | sace vaseyya āgāraṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | sacā'vaseyya (?)
tha-ap18:19.4: evaṃ rakkhiṃ mahāmuni → evaṃ rakkhiṃ mahāmune (bj) | mamaṃ dakkhi mahāmuni (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mamaṃ rakkhi mahāmuni (pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed) 19Th1.A:7 (22 piṭṭhe)
